title: Someone please explain to me why this game was an A+....

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
This match provided me with an A+ and Braum with and S+.
When a support gets 35 assists you should get an S+
But when the Bard adc goes 23/6/21, with 51 vision score, most damage in the game, most gold in the game. 

Just someone explain to me why it wasn't atleast an S-...

https://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/199341535/201449682

Also, why did braum get an S+ but Nunu got and S-? 

Thanks
{{champion:432}}

replies.body: Also not only that. The hardouts believe that its all about use of ward assiting eith objectives at the right time and also as mentioned min deaths and great cs. Just remember its vs all other summoners playing that charactor at the same time you are matched up against... so if they are doing better the s will go to them. Imo there are only so many they will hand out in a day. Might be wring but i think thats what they do.
Your CS was low and probs died 1 or 2 times too many
